name: Module API Demo
description: An example module to demonstrate module API services through the 'redcap_module_api' hook.

api-action-descriptions.description: Returns a list of items with item-id and item-name.
Adds an item to the list. Specify the item's name in the item-name parameter. The id of the new item will be returned as 'item-id'.
Removes an item from the list. Specifiy the item's id in the item-id parameter.
